      • createUser

        void createUser(User user)
         throws LoginException
        Create a User in the Database table.
        Parameters:
        user - User to create.
        Throws:
        LoginException - Custom Exception. Caught in FrontController. Sends User back to index.jsp.

      • login

        User login(String email,
           String password)
    throws LoginException,
           ShopException
        Login a User.
        Parameters:
        email - email of user.
        password - password of user.
        Returns:
        User object.
        Throws:
        LoginException - Custom Exception. Caught in FrontController. Sends User back to index.jsp.
        ShopException - Custom Exception. Caught in FrontController. Sends User back to /WEB-INF/customerpage.jsp

      • getOrders

        List<Order> getOrders(User user)
               throws ShopException
        Get all Orders made by this User.
        Parameters:
        user - User you want orders from.
        Returns:
        List of Orders from the User.
        Throws:
        ShopException - Custom Exception. Caught in FrontController. Sends User back to /WEB-INF/customerpage.jsp

          throws ShopException
        Create a single Order in the Database.
        Parameters:
        order - the one you want in the database.
        Throws:
        ShopException - Custom Exception. Caught in FrontController. Sends User back to /WEB-INF/customerpage.jsp

             throws ShopException
        Get a list of all the Users in the system.

        a list of all users.

      • getOrder

        Order getOrder(int id)
        throws ShopException
        Get an Order in the system. By ID.
        Parameters:
        id - of the order.
        Returns:
        Order object. With param id.
        Throws:
        ShopException - Custom Exception. Caught in FrontController. Sends User back to /WEB-INF/customerpage.jsp
